3. Wonderful camera quality compared to other brand which gives high pixel cameras.
4. Unique samsung features.
5. Very low r nil lagging
6. Dual Volte + Dedicated sim slot are greater advantage
7. Less irritating front cam in-screen flash
8. Worth for the money.

Negatives

2. Still hadn't received android 9
3. Very less features r there. For example there is no option to restrict data for a particular app like in mi phones.
4. Free fonts and themes are very very less. We buy the mobile with high price but still to make our mobile little unique we need to pay.
5. Unwanted inbuilt apps which cannot be disabled.

Review Title: Super quality display and huge battery for heavy users

Compareing it live to the s10+ was actually not a bad choice. Speaking of which, the 15w charger was a huge hit from my side because of its current battery life. One point to be noted was the inbox items has be upgraded as it requires an headset and case if possible. Lot of us who have bought this phone have expected that which wasn't provided.

Writing review after using for 3weeks.
Superfast fingerprint sensor, nice low light photography from front camera. Rear camera is also pretty much Good but wide angle shots quality is poor as it only uses 5MP camera for it. Portrait mode is also good. Super crystal clear selfies at outdoors. Battery life is good. SuperAmoled display makes viewing experience superb. Supports 5GHz WiFi transmission whereas M30 doesn'twhich is not mentioned in specifications. Faster processor no lag in opening any window.
Lowest SAR value means lower radiation emission hence more safe.
Cons
Rear cover looks classy much better than that shown in the photo but its plastic body hence catches scratches easily.
Not received Android pie & Samsung one UI update whereas lower J series started receiving it however Samsung said they will update soon.
Poor wide angle shots quality.

The phone has a massive 6.4 inch display with extremely small bezels and a dew drop camera. It is well built and the gradiation black colour is mesmerizing. The phone's 5000mAH has a great battery life that lasts well over a day. The fhd +
sAMOLED display is really good. The rear and the front cameras do a good job in taking great photos . The ultra wide rear camera also does a great job in taking pictures of landscapes and nature. The exynos 7904 processor makes the device run smoothly with no lag. The device is also very responsive and has a good placement of the power and volume buttons.
The drawbacks of this phone include a fingerprint
reader that isn't really responsive , hopefully a software update can fix this . The device is also running only android oreo and hasn't received an update to pie.
I rate this a phone a 7.5/10 as it is really worth the price

After 10 days the mobile stopped working. It's pretty slow. I think the problem is with the exynos processor.
When submitted to the Service center, they told about the replacement of motherboard and charging port.
I am worried that it's just 10 days and they may take away good parts from my mobile and replace the old ones which were working.

The phone never started. It is switching on and off by itself continuously. The phone was so hot after a while that I was scared to touch and put it away. DANGEROUS!!!! When I called the Amazon customer care, I was summarized about the process for 2 hours. And they said they will technician in 2 days but the service was not available in most of the pin codes around Bangalore. Do not buy the phone from Amazon!!!

The Samsung Galaxy M30 is a brilliant phone which excels in day to day performance. The phone comes with a great set of specifications which makes it the best bang for the buck. The Samsung Galaxy M30 has a beautiful 6.4 inch display which is full HD. The tall aspect ratio of the phone makes it feel very comfortable in the hand. The phones gets the juice from its Exynos octa-core processor which is paired with 4 GB of RAM. It also has an inbuilt 64 GB of internal memory which can be further expanded via a microSD card. The phone runs the latest Android Pie 9.0 out of the box and has all the required sensors on the phone like the proximity and light sensors. The fingerprint scanner on the device is placed on the back of the phone which is convenient to use. The phone is also paired with a humongous 5000 mAh battery which would last the user for a full day with heavy usage. The triple camera setup on the back of the camera click great pictures in the normal day light. The night light photography on the phone is also decent. The phone comes with several camera features which capture the moments perfectly. Overall, the phone is a winner in all departments and is priced at a reasonable price bracket which provides a seamless experience to the user.

The best viewing experience under 20k. I know a lot of flak that this phone draws is because of its inferior processor. Yes it's not a Snapdragon processor, yes it's gaming performance is not great(if you consider high specs game like pubg or asphalt, also if you aren't prejudiced, you won't find it as bad as it is being conveyed), but the point is, should it be the deciding factor for you? Again, it depends on you. One of the big chunk of information that people withhold is that normal to medium-high games hold well. Camera is again, don't expect a DSLR under 20k. Daylight photography won't disappoint. But the display, full hd+ super amoled viewing experience takes the cake. For me, being a casual, lazy gamer at best, this phone with it's best in class display makes sense. Also, I got it for around Rs 15500 with my Moto g4 plus for exchange.

Review Title: You can loose your job if you use this phone
Review Text: This is probably the worst phone in the market now. After a few days of use the phone stops charging. No it's not a battery issue. It's the very annoying 'moisture detected' issue. The phone had about 11% battery left. I plucked in the charger and 'moisture detected' message pops up. I was on a call with my client. after sometime the phone battery just died and didn't charge for 5 more hours. Faced a lot of heat from the client. Many others are also facing this issue.Never faced this kind of issue in any other phones. Had to buy a stand by phone. Looks Iike i lost my 15k on this phone.

Its been 1.5 months since i bought it and its screen got damaged in 1.2 months..i have to go to Samsung servife centre to repair it. Alongwith that it has serious serious network issues. It gives 200-400 kbs download speed at most whereas when i put my sim in MI phones its gives 1.5-2 mbs speed which price is half of its price, so much difference.I did all the tricks to make it fast but it cant go beyond it. I bought this phone because of the hype and Samsung brand but this is the worst phone I ever had.I should have bought Redmi instead (never faced such issues in Mi phone. I have multiole Mi phones. This phone is waste of money. Looks like Samsung compromised quality for reducing the price. Expected better from Samsung. Never going to buy medium range Samsung phones.

Review Title: Over all review about Samsung Galaxy m30
Review Text:
Display:very good
Battery:very good
Signal reception: avg
UI: worst(apps taking more than 2 seconds to open and some times closing forcefully. )
Camera: front camera is good, but back camera not that much, it's avg.
Future OS Updates: Not mentioned any where in the box, how many years they will provide. Security updates also not mentioned.
Fingerprint Scanner: Avg(for me , it is failed atleast 5 times in a day, and taking more than second to open)
Face Unlock: worst (even close your eyes it will open,and it is also taking time to open)
Processor: Avg
Screen on display: 9hrs
Android 9 + One UI optimization: Avg
Finally I suggest if you want good display and good battery life ,you go with it. Don't expect more from One UI.

No facility of smart view ( screen mirroring). Which means we can't see amazon prime videos in the tv by using chrome cast. Needs to be upgraded. Product seems to be under experimentation. Don't rush to buy.There was no review/comment by Samsung. No ear phones and back cover supplied as shown in the promo. Just a note of caution for fellow buyers.

"Samsung Galaxy M30 will be one of the first smartphones comes with triple camera in this 15000 to 20000 budget segment.Samsung Galaxy M30 is powered by a 1.6GHz octa-core Samsung Exynos 7904 processor that features 2 cores clocked at 1.8GHz and 6 cores clocked at 1.6GHz. It comes with 6GB of RAM.

The Samsung Galaxy M30 runs Android 8.1 Oreo and is powered by a 5,000mAh battery.

As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy M30 on the rear has a 13-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.9 aperture; a second 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture and a third 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture. It sports a 16-megapixel camera on the front for selfies, with an f/2.0 aperture. This is great for someone who loves photography like me!

Overall, the phone is very fast and you can switch apps fast, multitask with ease! Great phone for a student like me"

Review Title: You won't find a better display in this budget
Review Text:
I can comfortably state, and with conviction, that the Galaxy M30 has the best display (by some margin) on a phone that is priced under Rs 15,000. Samsung does make the best OLED panels for smartphones and it doesn't surprise me that the display on the Galaxy M30 is an absolute joy to look at.

The colours are punchy, the saturation levels are remarkable and the display gets bright enough to blind you for a few seconds if you suddenly flick the phone out of your pocket in the dark.
The Galaxy M30 packs a 5,000 mAh battery unit which lasts long for 2 days easily.
The phone packs a 13 MP f/1.9 primary camera supported by a 5 MP f/2.2 depth sensor and a 5 MP f/2.2 ultrawide-angle lens. Now, images shot in daylight turn out well with great contrast levels and natural-looking shades. Samsung does give you an easier way to turn on HDR but you can head to settings and turn that to 'Auto' if you like.

Samsung M30 have a fast fingerprint unlock, its wide angle and depth sensor also provide a
Best pictures , its 16 mp selfie camera is more than just saying best because it is awesome and you are gonna love to it. 5000 MAH battery provides a long lasting experience even on more powerconsumig apps. It is a complete powerhouse with big battery and 15W fast charger. And its recent update of android pie with one ui make it to be comparable to A30. Samoled display provides you a best video experience. I feel only one problem with its face unlock but I sure the problem will fix with future updates. Its eynox 7904 processor provides a lag free and high graphics game playing experience. So at last I as it belongs to M series it is for millenials.
Excellent product at that price but sometimes hanging but picture quality and camera very nice 👌

it worked for 1st 15 days only. After that i started seeing the problem. Now only i confirmed that its not a SIM issue and only problem with Samsung M30 Mobile. Same inconsistency with mobile data network as well.

Review Title: Good phone with the good price
Review Text: No where in the product description has mentioned that this phone can be used only in India. I didn't expect a phone like this from Samsung....!, I really love it. But one thing I miss the trade mark feature of Samsung is the top class built quality(look wise, I thought it would be better looking) and iconic looks. The glass sandwich design, the unique design that stay away from other manufacturers, that design is now put down by samsung is a bit disappointment. But Finally got the nerves of Indian Consumers, especially in internals of the phone.....!

But being a Samsung lover, I like the older iconic design and present hardware and One UI (Which is the best from Sam). Using 3 Samsung Phones in my life till date, the striking AMOLED 😎😎😎 which is enough to me buy other flagship phone from Sam.!!!!! That's it!

Samsung has suddenly become a lot more adventurous of late. There's been a flurry of launches over the past few months, and it looks like the Korean giant is catching on to the fact that it needs to innovate and jump on board with trends as they happen. We usually see new top-end features debut with the flagship Galaxy S and Galaxy Note series, and then trickle down to the mid-tier A-series and youth-focused J-series. For example, Samsung was one of the first to introduce tall, narrow Infinity Display screens, but it took ages for this well-received feature to show up on lower-tier offerings. Competitors caught on much sooner, and began selling low-cost phones that looked much more modern and sleek than Samsung's own.

I really liked this phone and I decided it to buy it for a long time. I am a movies and music lover more than a player so sAmoled display and Dolby atmos made the thing more beautiful. But the most amazing thing is the powerful battery and the speed of charging. The 15 watt charger charges the phone at the speed 4% per 5 mins. And the last thing i would like to say is the triple camera. Every photo have high pixel density and ultra wide camera is really awesome. You should definitely try this phone out. The only downfall of this phone is the processor. Exynos is and was never with par with snapdragon. But hope it will try to improve.
And i will recommend about the feature Always On Display. Its make it more fun.

Although processor is exynos, which not on par with snapdragon, however it runs all applications and games effectively. I prefered it because of Super Amoled panel and great battery life (5000 mah) which isn't available in any other phone in this segment.
Overall, It justifies its cost.

Review Title: Go for it if not a heavy gamer, all else boxes it ticks.

Review Title: Good phone but could have been better given the price range
Review Text:
All in all its a good budget phone.

Fingerprint sensor is bit of a disappointment as it takes around 2-3 seconds to recognize and unlock the device
The camera is good and takes amazing photographs with low light.

Review Title: Go ahead for Samsung M30 blindly !!
Review Text:
M30 is a Beast model in this price segment.
I admire this phone for following reasons,
- Firstly the radiation, the SAR value is around ~0.4 only where other phones are more than one.
- There is not much heating issue for an average user.
- Battery back lasts atleast 30hours in one shot charging for good usage.
- Phone is best specification in this price segment and ofcourse its Samsung first ever leap to launch a phone in this price with heavily loaded options.
- Triple camera does the Job pretty well. It has wide angle lenses to capture big landscapes as well.
Output is much better in day light.
Night photography is average.

What i like in this mobile phone is its screen. Which is way better than any other company is providing, camera quality isn't good but front camera will not let u down.
Battery is the second most thing you can love about this phone.
One UI update is here, believe it or not samsung is killing it. If your main purpose isn't camera and if you cannot buy galaxy A50, you should go for this one. It is way awesome than i described it

Review Title: Not at all durable.. Samsung using cheap quality material..
Review Text: This phone is not at all durable.. Samsung is using cheap materials to reduce the price.. I dropped the phone while sitting in a chair inside the office and the display was gone.. it was not a huge fall and more over there was a tempered screen and case.. there was no physical damage to the tempered glass.. only a minor scratch on the display.. Samsung service centre charged me 6000 rs for replacing the display.. this is absolutely pathetic.. there are phones much cheaper and durable for the given price.. don't go for this phone or any other M series phone for that matter..

Overall , I give 3.5 out of 5 interms of build quality, sound, camera and durability.
The best thing about the fone is its screen _ Samsungs Super Amoled screen really Rocks !!!
BATTERY is second considering point.

After using this phone for more than a month, I am totally satisfied with the battery life. On an average, a single charge gives me two days of battery backup !
Camera is good in daylight but not that good in low light.
Overall, a very good phone for the price !

The Samsung Galaxy M30 has a gorgeous AMOLED screen and looks just awesome from the front. The front camera resides in a U-shaped notch, which is inconsequentially smaller than most of the phones out there in the market. Morever it adds a gradient finish to spice things up. Galaxy M30 is super comfortable to wield. The battery backup on the Galaxy M30 is excellent. The phone can easily last for a day of heavy usage, it supports fast charging -and- Samsung also bundles a fast charger in the box. Also its weight is so less that when I carry it in my jeans, I hardly feel that its a phone which is the most important thing for a college student like me. I love it.

Excellent phone. Huge battery life, stands for one full day with continuous use. For camera I'll give 3/5, not poor nor excellent. SAMOLED Display scores outstanding. Crystal clear. I worried about camera performance before buying, but I'm satisfied(not gaming user). The main reason for buying Samsung is to avoid Chinese product. And also this is Indian make. Very much satisfied. Premium look. Notification LED not available, that's the one disadvantage. Unable to use/ save memory card storage for WhatsApp/WPS office, this is another disadvantage. Overall satisfied.

So if u have a budget of 15, 000 rs , I will recommend you to buy this phone.

Review Title: System too slow with lesser applications installed

The only problem i see is heating. It gets heated even for a basic use i.e. is on calls. 15 mins in call and the phone upperside will heat up so badly that it will be difficult to continue using the phone. Its so damn uncomfortable and dangerous. This appears to be a flaw in the handset which Samsung doesnt agree to. I am trying to return my phone but its just too difficult for us to make these big companies realise that even Indians expect quality product. Its high time they start doing this.

Review Title: Phone is Just Awaesome. Fully Satisfied.
Review Text: Samsungs sAmoled displays are just awaesome. The main highlights of this phone is the display which i think is fantastic in this price range and also the triple rear camera which we are getting in this range below 15k. Overall a good phone for moderate user not so good for heavy gamers because the processor is not that good but for daily use and light gaming its one of the best phones on this price range.

Display is really Good. - 4.7 out of 5

Fingerprint scanner is responsive but personally I don't like it's position. - 3.5 out of 5

I heard lot about the camera.. but after using it.. I didn't like it that much - Image stabilization - 2 out of 5

Battery life is good - 4.6 out of 5

Samsung Galaxy M30 is an amazing phone with super AMOLED display ,16M colors with 6.4 inch(88.1 screen to body ratio).The resolution is 1080*2340 pixels. The battery life is also amazing with 5000mAh, it can literally work for days on standby and with continuous use for over a day atleast. There are 3 main cameras with depth sensors and HDR quality.
Adding on to it is the chipset which is Exynos 7904 Octa. 4 GB RAM works perfectly good and is fast enough. Samsung Galaxy M30 is one of the best phones at such a great price. I would highly recommend you to buy this product

Build quality is plastic which bears scratches easily. Display is sAMOLED but it's warmer when compared to A series. Limited support to Samsung Apps viz, Samsung pass, Secure folder, Samsung pay mini, Bixby, etc are not supported to M series. Easy to hold as it has less weight though it has 5000 mAh battery. Front camera always smoothes the image and detail is not great. Camera is good under daylight conditions. Go for A30 which is far better than M30.

I bought it just two days back.
My previous phone was moto g 4 plus bought back in 2015.
Samsung is a brand but I feel this phone is just satisfying.
Display is great. Camera quality is great. But the small features which was provided by moto g is not provided by Samsung.
So it's ok to buy it but nothing so special about it

The phone is super light & is offered at a really good price. Nice sleek design. The blue gradient color is the ne to look out for. The camera is pretty amazing & the display is quite impressive & making it an amazing view to have. The 5000 mAh battery lasts for almost two days on one full charge. The display is crystal clear & can work when used in direct sunlight. The signature feature is the wide angle mode of the phone. The battery life on the other hand is long enough to work over. Even though the battery is low it charges quickly to enjoy it again. It possesses almost all the features of a professional camera.

Only likes, no dislikes. This phone has changed my negative perception about Samsung phone. In the Past I used to use Samsung Duos which used to get hanged and I would get frustrated every now and then. This phone is doing really excellent job. Camera, Battery, Fingerprint reader, Security patches, overall design any many more features that I might not know are all awesome. At the price of 15k, this is the best one in this segment and I would recommend everyone to go for it.

Battery drains rapidly although I never play games nor use it for watching videos or play music. Finger print reader is very very slow sometimes it takes more than two three touch to read. Although it is 6GB variant, the performance is not up to the mark with basic Apps installed. If you move certain 3rd party Apps from device storage to SD card then you won't be able to update the Apps till you uninstall and again reinstall the App in device storage.

The pros of this device is the display, battery, type-C port. Hardware wise this one is good device but when it comes the software it's little bit disappointing, the camera software processing is not good, no image stabilization camera needs to be improve a lot. The camera has got good hardware but software is not upto the mark Samsung should improve the camera software in coming updates. Please Samsung push good software update.

I bought Samsung m30 almost 3 months ago and so far I have had a great experience using this phone . For a better understanding of the review I hereby quote the pro and cons of Samsung m30
PROS:
1) An excellent display owing to the amoled display screen
2)great user experience
3)the camera quality is really exceptional in this price range .
4)the battery life is really great, the battery lasts for more than a day.
5)it provides quite handy features
CONS:
1)The fingerprint sensor is average
2)it might hang a little bit.
How I can use this phone in abroad?

I got duped by the brand name, could have got a better deal hadn't I got sucked into this brand facade. There is some software glitch in this phone sometimes you can't make calls unless u restart it. And the other issue is when u take the phn out of your pocket either the torch is on or your bluetooth is active or some other such crap meaning it doesn't have a pocket mode like one plus. Signal strength is also not too impressive.

This is my first Samsung smartphone. Samsung's budget smartphone literally has got everything.
The AMOLED display is excellent.
Great battery life.
Samsung gave no compromise on camera quality.
The wide angle lens is just amazing.
The fingerprint sensor has not been upto the mark.But I don't find it difficult.
The other thing is that it is not a gaming phone.
But games work fine in moderate mode.
In my opinion this is one of the best smartphone below Rs20,000.
I also recommended this phone to my cousin and he uses it.

Review Title: Best phone with latest specs in budget!❤️
Review Text:
I have been using this phone for more than three months now!

This is a phone I'm absolutely in love with! It has got all the specifications that you need! It's really fast and the battery life is impeccable! I can use it for more than a day one charged full. The camera is on point! In love with it! Beautifies a little though but it is a more than a decent one that one can get at this price range. RAM is really fast. Facial recognition is accurate. The touch is responsive!
I strongly suggest you to go for this phone! You will not regret it.

It's an okayish package but having used a OnyPlus phone prior to this (that also an ancient model like OnePlus X), I am somewhat disappointed by the super Amoled display and touch receptiveness. The display could have been better. A OnePlus X Amoled display was so much better than a claimed SuperAmoled display of this phone. Also, few notification buttons are not as touch reactive as they should be. These things kind of kill the edge but I am reminded of the price at which this model comes along and overall, I guess the feedback would be "satisfactory "

If you want a phone with long battery life with top class display. This mobile is one to watch for.Could have made a provided a better rear camera similar to a50 with a good supporting lowlight features. Selfie camera is good compared to rear camera. Android pie version and one ui available in update.But it is a good value for money compared to a quick obsolete budjet phomes which will wear off after 2 years. Also happy to mention that there is no unwanted advertisements here.Battery charging is good.It is a worth to try this mobile.

The best smartphone in midrange it uas the best rear and front camera, best battery, best fingerprint reader, i am very happy with my M30 ...everyone who is looking for a smartphone in midrange can definitely go with this..

Everything is best but except the thing that Samsung Galaxy M30 hasn't provide earphone . There is also hasn't provide cleaning cloth . But despite all these, the phone has super amyloid display and fast processor. This comes with great battery life ,camera is great and doesn't let me down. It is handy and has a great storage capacity about 128gb . The phone is awesome bcoz it carries best features. The phone is definitely a true value for money. Thanks to Amazon!

My good will about Amazon shopping has been abruptly lost recently.
I had purchased 2 Samsung M30 Phones just three weeks back and one of its speaker stopped working after two weeks of delivery. Now I am compelled to visit Samsung authorized service centre. First they changed the speaker. Still no use . Now they have promised to change the motherboard . I am terribly disappointed. They say they can't detect any issues with phone . Still it doesn't work. Sorry to say that this time I am extremely dissatisfied with shopping with amazon

Review Title: Best phone I've ever seen at this price range
Review Text: recently started using Samsung Galaxy M30 and I’m absolutely in love with that ! The gorgeous AMOLED display is what really makes the Galaxy M30 tick. The battery power on the Samsung Galaxy M30 is totally outstanding!! And how can I forget my most favourite thing which is camera , I just can’t stop clicking pictures from the auto focus mode! Also specially love the fact that their are two SIM card slots plus as memory card slot ! After a lot of bad experience from other brands this has absolutely become my favourite!! You guys are going to love this phone and would not want to switch thereafter.

A very good smartphone from Samsung in mid ranges. Superb build quality,infinity display, Very Nice camera from Samsung, 2 days battery like a tank, type C 3X fast charging, nice fingerprint sensor. Brand Samsung is enough for everything in this phone. Quality is maintained by the Samsung and nicely designed this phone under 15000 Rs. Buy without any doubts and just go faor it.

Honor play is more than better.
Camera quality is average not so much good.

The phone is best in its class and for the price it is available, i would say there is nothing wrong.
The battery once fully charged can go for whole 24 hours against normal use which includes 2-3 hours of gaming(hope my manager is not reading this), insta surfing, watching netflix for another 2 and 3-4 hours of calling.
Camera no doubt is best in its class. I know there are better ones in the market but they are also priced accordingly.
All that and add samsung's one UI to it. You get a perfect phone.

2. Very less speaker output
3. Battery performance is not much as 5000mah

Very nice smartphone from amazone...thanks to samsung.

Having a Samsung M30, feels like you own a powerhouse.
Its the best phone in its price range. The battery life is long lasting. I have seen 2 days battery backup while being online for almost every moment and watching online contents.
Camera is really good and have some unique features in it.

Totally a new version of Samsung... samsung m30 which is better than what i have expected with a powerful 5000mah battery... and the fingerprint sensor is working amazingly... and one of the smartphone with triple camera but the rear camera lacks a bit quality and the front cam running smoothly with 16mp cam and its new design is awesome... and the fingerprint scanner is competitive with the other smartphones... and one of the best midrange smartphone with amazing features... the most amazing feature is its battery backup and fingerprint scanner

The only reason i bought it over Redmi note 7 pro is because of its front camera . yeah it has more battery life , fast charger bundled with it and better display than 7 pro but that hardly matters. Note 7 pro has better processor , excellent design and better UI. i would have bought redmi note 7 pro but as it is a gift for someone who is selfie obsessed , i went for M30.
final opinion : Buy samsung M40 which is a bit expensive but better than M30 and note 7 pro in all aspects 😂

This is the best phone I ever had in this price range.
The phone performance is absolutely ravishing. Even oneplus is not able to compete with the battery backup of this phone. Super amoled screen with largest ever battery backup is deadly combo. Moreover triple camera makes this phone unbeatable.

People going for MI or Oppp brand phones. .. Buy this phone M30 as this also comes in same price range with Samsung trust and best features ever.

Review Title: Samsung galaxy M30....good but not meet the expectations
Review Text: Samsung claims its 5000 mah battery. But as per my experience in last 4 days, it drains very fast. The bettery looks like 2500mah. Camera is decent and could be better. No slow motion video can capture. Edge detectiin in not so perfect. I am not a heavy user like playing pubg and all that. So for perfomance basis its 4 out of 5.

Review Title: Must Read My experience of using Samsung Galaxy M30
Review Text: The Smart Phone is good and working nice, the clock speed of processor is bit medium to respond faster, at this price RAM should have given 6 GB the triple rear camera is superb but if it is 16+8+8 will be a great boom to the phone, Front camera 16 GB is simple awesome, The Super AMOLED Display is no words to review, it is almost peaks, FINALLY battery 5000Mah is another superb spec to afford for this M30, and the SAR value 0.49 is Great, Finally the price might be 12990 is a great value to buy and enjoy the features

Review Title: Amazing and Worth the penny spent
Review Text:
I bought this phone after much deliberation and comparing different models like Vivo, Oppo, Redmi etc.

Althought many said that samsung phones are not that great in performance and hangs very frequently, personally i have liked the phone very much.. its battery quality is the best in business.. also the camera and other functions are great to use.

I hadnt earlier used samsung mobile, but have loved this one for sure. Would definitely recommend to buy the same

Have been using m30 from past 2 months, loved this product. But on one fateful day, my phone fell from a height of not more than 2feet!! and the display is not working.

Screen is intact without any damage, but the inner layer display has been damaged. I blame the build quality for this.

On top of this, as stated by service center people, warranty is not applicable for 'physical damage'. Have to pay more than 6k to get the screen replaced.

Now I feel I made a big mistake buying this phone.

Review Title: Superb Phone in less than 15k Range
Review Text:
Hi,

I have been using M30 since last 2 weeks.

Pros:
1. Excellent Battery backup
2. Good Display and camera.
3. Very light weight

Cons:
1. Speaker positions could have been better
2. Fingerprint sensor does not sense immediately. Sometime has lag.

Amazing speed and finest features within medium budget, makes Samsung M30 unique. It has great finger print sensor readers and decent camera qualities. What amuses me is its battery life. It charges very quickly (10 mins to reach more than 30-40% battery life) and runs for 2 two days!!! Whatelse we need ? Ask for more and you would get it for less cost, from Samsung. Mind you, Samsung produces the least SAR (Specific Absorption Rate) i.e. low radiation emitting phones!

Review Title: Simply beast at this price point
Review Text: I using this phone roughly 3 mnth and i would say this is the best budget oriented samsung which have excellent battery back up and display. Processor is not upto the mark...its lags some time..when using heavy games and multitasks...but day to usage u cant face any type of lagging problem...camera is good but not upto the mark..on this range redmi note is a camera beast..so if you a camera lover and need powerfull processor then this device is not for you...overall i would say this is the first samsung mid range puncher
Back camera is not up to the mark

Review Title: Best phone in this price Segment.
Review Text: This phone is steal for its price.. It has great SUPER AMOLED Display of 6.4 inches with FHD+ Resolution. A massive battery of 5000 Mah with fast charging are its main Highlights of the phone. It has brand value of Samsung and it's not a cheap Chinese phone. Received damaged product. There was a dent across the sim card tray. Unfortunately I was not in town to receive the phone. By the time i came back and unpacked the phone it was beyond the return duration. It is unbelievable that a brand like Samsung can pack damaged item and sell it as brand new

Review Title: Had to replace the first device I received
Review Text: I received a faulty device at first which was hanging and restarting at will from the first setup process itself. I must say Amazon customer service is really good. They listen to my issue try debugging via remote access and then sent a technician to check the device and he confirmed it was faulty. Within two days I received a new device. Overall the device is value for money. Great battery life amazing display and touch good camera quality good performance so far. I am a basic user and don't use heavy apps and games.

Review Title: I think there was a problem with the processor.
Review Text: Battery life is awesome. Camera and display is good. But the main thing in a phone is processor. I think exynos processor is not up to the mark. Some apps is crashing and the network speed is slow. If we consider the health of our body, this phone is a better choice, because this is a phone with a low SAR value. M30 is one of the lowest SAR value smart phone available in indian market.

Review Title: Not the best phone in this segment. Felt Bad about Amazon.
Review Text: The major cons are Bluetooth not working properly, Call quality is not good, network strength is not showing properly, data connectivity issue. Have asked for refund, but amazon refused it and forcing us to get replacement. Overall unhappy shopping experience in Amazon. Felt Bad.

Good phone. Video quality is excellent. Display is awesome. If your major use case is video watching, then you can blindly go for this product.
Only one cons: back panel is very delicate and with careful handling also scratches are easily appearing. Good back cover is necessary for this phone.

Review Title: Good for Normal User - Go for it!
Review Text:
Display - Excellent
Battery - Excellent
Camera - Good (Day light - Good, Low Light -
Average, Potrait - Good)
Performance - Good (Average for Gamers)

Pubg works fine but battery drains 9-10% for one game.

The display quality will make you forget the drawbacks.

1. Battery charging is fantastic. It takes hardly 30 minutes to charge from 60% to 100%.
2. Battery is long lasting. Normally I don't need to charge it for whole day (provided it is fully charged at the beginning).
3. Selfie camera is wonderful.
4. I purchased 2nd unit also after using 1st unit for 15 days.
5. Strongly recommended as value for money.

Review Title: Battery Powerhouse with super Amoled display

Looks like Samsung is back in market to compete with likes of Xiaomi Lenovo oppo realme vivo where there is neck to neck competition in this segment.. Wish Samsung all the best :=)

Mobile getting too much heating while mobile data even for few minutes. Battery getting drained very fast with few apps installed and with Mobile Data ON. Excessively heating during Camera usage for more than 10 shots. I have posted the issue on SAMSUNG Groups, but in vain. Horrible to have the mobile in pocket with mobile data ON. Don't expect such a low quality from an international brand SAMSUNG. With three months experience, I advice don't purchase.

Review Title: Powerful Value packed Lasting Battery power, storage filled speed monster.
Review Text:

but I miss Samsung pass & Pay, biz card reader apps

Little too heavy, may be 5000mah battery is the reason.

Finger print reader works very well though it looks smaller in size.

Storage is good.

Screen resolution is very good not the best

Camera quality is not high quality.

Value for money

Most important thing like about this M30 for me is , it is more easier to use than my past brands ... Camera clarity and speed is almost good... And one should not miss this model it is awesome choice in budget prise....

It contains the most option in minimum price... It is a reliable model in this minimum price...

Excellent handset under 15K. Hereby enlisting pros and cons:
Pros:
1) Beast of a Battery. Will last a day on Average use.
2) Vibrant Display featuring SUPER AMOLED. Amazing colors and textures.
3) Pie upgrade ready to install.
4) Ultralight body. But firm grip in hand.
5) Fast Fingerprint sensor.

Cons:
1) Camera is decent but could have been better against competitors.
2) Gaming is good but not as good as Snapdragon powered devices featuring HD graphics.

Review Title: Poor Quality Phone Made by Samsung
Review Text: Don't fall prey for the features boosted by Adds! It's a below average phone! Phones with single camera captures far better images than this 3 camera setup phone! Except display nothing is good in the phone! Finger print reader is very slow! Face Recognition most of the time it doesn't work at all! Battery life is good, but though fast charging is there it takes more than an hour for full charge!!

Review Title: Best product, but No video stabilization and no 4k video recording
Review Text: Slow face recognition in dark light, some times not recognized, fingerprint reader is good, screen quality awesome, but No video stabilization, No 4k recording, smooth multitasking and finally best battery

Review Title: Best middle class phone for middle class people...
Review Text: Being a samsung person for last 10 years i had to say this samsung M30 seriusly a good quality cell phone with a great battery back of 5000mah and a 6gb RAM which is enough to do whatever you like and your phone will be still remain smooth. In 18k this is a very good phone according to me. There's only 1 problem that there's no head phone otherwise i could have given a 5 star. Now a days no company is providing a head phone which is not good. Please attach a head phone and then no one can beat samsung.

Overall the phone is OK.. Battery is the best thing in this phone.. Software, in my opinion is not user friendly... After about 2-3 months of usage I couldn't still figure out how to modify the REMINDER TONE... It is useless as the available times are not lengthy enough to notice and I am unable set longer tones..
Another issue noted is the Spell checker Auto corrects even the names typed in to the Contacts.. that's funny...

Review Title: Misselling, poor packaging by samsung, accessories not included
Review Text: The phone is recieved in a very poor packaging and no care was given for its safty. The user mannual is not included in in the box items whish is a lear violation of the trade policy. The usb cable provided is very short in size about 15" to 18" hence useless. In their add the charger is of 15volts with fast charging bu5 the adopter provided is a 9 volts. Have not yet gone theough the mechanical and technological features but over all m disappointed with such cheap efforts

Review Title: Samsung should take action on face unlocking function and Dolby Atmos feature.
Review Text: Display is awesome, but speaker's sound is very bad, Dolby Atmos sound is gimmick in earphones. Face recognition is not secure, phone got unlocked even eyes are close. Other features like camera, processing speed and design is good. No image stabilization.

The mobile display (main attraction) is way to good competitively, camera is okish (its good but in good light conditions otherwise its okish), fingerprint is good,sound of the speaker is bit low, face recognition is unpredictable about performance, look wise good, battery life is one of the best I have seen and would suggest to buy this phone if there is NORMAL USE and would be satisfied by the use as nothing is as such bad about the phone somethings are okish but all in all a good buy at this price.

Writing cons: only
1. Camera autofocus is very slow night time
2. Battery draining little fast. But no heat observed like redmi.
3. Face lock very slow compares to other phones.
4. You can't return mobile, replace is available.
5. Worst packing by Amazon. Box damaged outside, luckily the mobile is safe.
Not worth the wait.... It's a gimmick... Very expensive for this kind of quality... Not at all up to the mark... Feels like some cheap Chinese phone in the body of samsung

Review Title: Very bad network reception, frequent call drops
Review Text: It's been only 15 days since I bought this phone. I was having network problem since beginning. I thought it can be fixed via software and contacted Samsung customer care instead ofcourse returning it to Amazon. Now amazon won't take its back and I am stuck with the poor reception quality phone. Today, I am going to service center to resolve the matter. Really terrible feeling, having to visit service center for your new phone.

Especially when it's from Samsung. Yeah, because till now Samsung was famous for its Flagship S-series smartphones and was badly criticised for the poor specs to price ratio of their products in the mid-range segment. But the M-series, with such amazing and competent features, shakens the whole mid-range market and gives an assurance to the users that you're not gonna regret it at any point of time after purchasing this which you may never get with some Chinese Smartphones (You know what I mean..😉)

Everything is awesome about this phone I really liked it
Its battery life is amazing and also the 3x fast charging mode these both really helpful and amazjng
Also the camera quality is fantastic and low light photography is awesome
Also it gives a perfect click everytjme
Fingerprint reader and face unlock are the fatest working features of this phone they really never nake an error
The phone is over all amazing among all the M series of samsung

Worst phone I have ever come across. Except for making calls n sending SMS, this so called smart phone does not appear to be useful. While playing game screen suddenly go dead. While watching video often it gets minimised. So called 3X charging is a farce. I also have Nokia 7plus n no comparison in charging. If U put on charge it gets heated up. Other features after trying, I'll comment. overall, great disappointment from gaint brand like Samsung.

Review Text: As u said it supports 4G+4G network. But it has only 2G, 3G and LTE network. That's the reason I hope internet running slow on M30 mobile. It's really surprised. Except this find all features as mentioned.

Review Title: Overall, I would recommend this phone.
Review Text:

* battery Life ( Upto 8-10 hours of screen on time, On normal use upto 2 days of battery life)

* 6.4 inch screen

Cons

Review Title: Best display with efficient battery, SMART investment, Crazy Device at this price point.
Review Text:
Amazing SUPER AMOLED display with efficient power saving features.
Giant 5000mah battery with electrifying superfast charging, lasts 1.5days on normal use with 4G & Wifi.
Wide angle lens critically useful in clicking some pro level snaps.
The processor could have been better (any Snapdragon) but the gap is fulfilled through 6GB Ram (in my case)
PubG runs smooth at 60fps.

OVERALL: Smart Investment, Superb Pricing, Satisfies all mass needs.

Review Title: PROS AND CONS OF SAMSUNG GALAXY M30
Review Text:
🤩Pros:-😍

->Excellent Display
->Battery backup
->Supports HD streaming
->Dedicated card slot
->USB Type-C port and fast charging

😞Cons:-😣

->No notification light
->Not for heavy gaming
->No case cover in the box
->plastic build

Overall a good phone.
1. Looks are amazing.
2. Selfie shooter is great.
3. Rear camera is stable and clicks good photos.
4. Video watching experience is amazing with amoled screen.
5. Sound is loud and clear in loud speaker and earphones both.
In total the phone is jack of all trades. Not the best in this segment. But you get the trust of samsung . Ideal phone for people who don't play lots of games .

From last several times I was skipping Samsung for a lot of reasons, main being price for the configuration they ask. But this time Samsung surprised me. Triple camera with good quality pictures, screen size, battery capacity and life 5000 Mah, RAM and Internal Memory 6+128 GB, face unlock etc for this price with quality assurance of Samsung is just make this value buying and it takes no time I gone for this. Amazingly I bought this once more after flash sale period for one of my family member

Have used the phone for around 7 days. I was using Honor 7 previously. Bought it at 15k

Pros:
Battery and Screen are amazing. 5000 mAh gives you enough juice to run without facing any issue. Haven't played games so no idea. Camera looks good. Wide image is superb feature.

Cons:
Finger Print Sensor is bad. At times requires multiple attempts also response is slow. There is no notification led. Heats up at times during continuous usage.

The phone at this cost outstands with its large internal storage and the 6gb ram, but the camera is not satisfying when it comes to wide angle photo, the picture quality is soo compressed and what i miss the most in this phone is the slowmo and fast farward video recording options, when the galaxy A50 gives better camera and also the slowmo features at the similar cost. Except the camera, the phone is doing better in other terms for this price!

Hello, everyone i want to tell u that before buying galaxy m30 i was a moto user and i use almost all devices of G series. But when i purchase this M30 model from Amazon really guyz i personally suggest my family and friend circle to purchase this model.

Review Title: Samsung, the brand name is enough!
Review Text:
I think Samsung, the brand name is enough. I bought Samsung Galaxy M30 mobile on April 27 for that I have been waited for months. After using for a day, I have written the review. Simply it is excellent in all the specifications, Worth buyable for this amount. Best things are:
Super Amoled display
Triple cameras
"fingerprint reader"
"face recognition"
Best "battery life" Still 50% remaining after using a day!
Simply I loved it.
I Suggest everyone to buy!

It has a smooth rounded finish on all four corner and back panel which is made completely of plastic. To add touch of class it is made of two tone from blue to darker blue . It both looks and feel good in hands. It is blessed with infinity u display which means it give high screen to body ratio of 90%. Performance is excellent. I love its 5000mhz battery life. Camera quality is brilliant. It has triple camera. In over all i am satisfied with the product i will recommed you all to buy it.

The phone is snapy

battery is good but the fast charging needs improvement 10 out of 10 for battery and 7 out of 10 for fast charging
The cam is also up to the mark 8 out 10 but lacks the good feel of an oppo (beauty)
The overall raiting is 8.5 out of 10

Review Title: My First Experience with Samsung Ever
Review Text:
Excellent battery back up. poor camera quality. Would have been great if Samsung provided earphones, tempered glass and back cover within the box.

Drawback: Heats up a lily while charging or long hours gaming.

Camera is Excellent, The Exynos 7904 processor is beast to handle all of the tasks & sufficient for modern games like Asphalt 8 , 9 & Pubg, Modern Combat 5. Can play Almost any games. Video Quality achieved in this phone is mind blowing with Super AMOLED Display with widevine L1 certification screen. 6GB RAM is LPDDR4X which adds boost to any heavy game or application or multitasking without any lags. In short Galaxy M30 is the value for money performance phone at lowest price

Review Title: Premium smartphone in a low budget ever
Review Text:
A very good initiative taken by SAMSUNG INDIA to full fill the needs of mid range smartphones users by providing a immersive flagship features in a price of less than 20k . A best lucrative option for the middle class as well as can be used by any group from young to adults . Introduction of premium features like superamold displays with fast charging of 5000mah battery make the phone more compatible and over all feels good in hand
Thanks samsung india

This mobile is nearly robotic. Most of the Samsung mobile batteries drain fast but this is really really an exception. Unique in face recognition, finger scanning, camera quality and good amount of RAM which is economical.

Customization of O.S. is not good, Many essential things are missing such as Connection speed indicator.

Not a Value for Money product hence choose wisely.

Somehow face recognition part didn't work for me or may be I need to figure it out again... but overall happy with the purchase

Pros - Good screen. Nice interface. Not many bloatwares. Good camera. Good battery life.

Cons - Processor is slow, better processors available in similarly priced phones. Phone speaker sound is really low. Low light photos are not good.

Review Title: Feature packed at a reasonable price !
Review Text: The graphics are amazing ! No lag... the finger print and face lock works like a charm. The wide angle, live focus and depth cameras are quite good too. There is no front led but the on-screen flash works well in low light conditions. Appreciate the inclusion of the blue light filter and infinity-u display.

Review Title: It's a very good phone but could be better a bit more
Review Text: Over all this phone is a done deal. Everything works good but even though with 6 GB RAM, Multiple games are still running slow and please update the interface little more. However this interface is a lot better than previous Samsung Devices. In this range of price I can say this phone is the best deal you can get.

Review Title: Samsung M30 is truly a Masterpiece from Samsung.
Review Text:
The Samsung Galaxy M30 is the masterpiece from Samsung.
Overall it is having Value for Money. No lags.No hanging issues.Battery too reliable for 2 days usage under normal data usage. The best part is about the seller. The seller "STPL" is very genuine, reliable and professional.
I must say the packaging was professionally sealed and secured by Amazon and Seller "STPL".I received it on time.No issues found till date.

The phone is full of problem. Whenever you receive notification the lock screen dispay light does'nt turn off. Finger Print does'nt works. After receiving text message the lock screen display do not turn off. If you receive message at 1AM, the display light remains there in the morning till you manually turn off with power button. In this time the whole battery gets low.
Two months have passed, Each day it has given problem. and what to talk about service centre?

Review Title: Worth the buck. Better than J8 anytime.
Review Text:
Its a great device with well packed features.All the sensors are present and PUBG can be played on HD high frame rate without any lag(Matters to some people ).
It's camera seems upgraded,the wide angle is magic.The screen is big and beautiful.
Sometimes,the fingerprint sensor can be buggy but the face recognition unlocks the phone in less than a second even in darkness so thats not an issue.

Samsung M30 is best phone in this price bracket for a big brand value. Unlike other Chinese products in this range which tend to have different issues in couple of months. Samsung has given its flagship galaxy features and style in this budget photo. Excellent battery backup with a good user interface Excellent camera quality. Extra camera enables a perfect wide angle click. In all a must have for every consumer bracket.

The Samsung Galaxy M30 seems to tick most of the right boxes for a mid-range Android smartphone. Fingerprint reader works perfectly, batterylife is soo good, camera quality is good too, the only problem is about the software which is not as updated as what’s available on the Galaxy A30, a phone that was launched around the same time as the Galaxy M30. But now we got pie update with oneUI. It was really good. Overall I'm very happy with the performance of the mobile.

Review Title: Must buy in budget smartphone segment!!!
Review Text: The phone is really good in this price range. The SuperAmoLED screen is awesome with great sound quality. Speed is good. Overall it is the best phone in this price segment. Contains all the features for a best phone.

Review Title: A great deal for such price....not good for night time photography though...
Review Text: Im quite satisfied with the item....the fingerprint and face unlock are fast...the camera quality is amazing but only in daylight....night time photos are quite buzzy and theres a lot of noice or pixelation in the photos.....and battery life is amazing....it almost works for the whole day...and is not switched off when you need it....and the price is up to mark...really a great deal...

I don't use face recognition feature and therefore it is not relevant to me. I mainly purchased it for display which I found to be excellent. Rest of the features are also great. Overall a winner from Samsung stable . The low radiation emission also was an important factor in choosing this over Xiomi Note 7 pro. Display is amazing. Appears no less than a premium phone double its price.

Look and build wise its good. But camera needs improvement. And most important the mobile gets heated up very fastly when you use camera or make a call. This is a serious issue which needs to be addressed ASAP.
